Name: Potion Catalyst - REC
Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the healing abilities within raw materials.
Description$english: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the healing abilities within raw materials.
Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

recipes.Des$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
